Metadata.Title: Using the TEAM Mentor Eclipse Plugin for Fortify
Metadata.DirectLink: Using the TEAM Mentor Eclipse Plugin for Fortify

Content.Data:
Open Fortify Perspective and Findings\\ In this example we have a project with a simple, vulnerable, application. *Analyze the project by going to HP Fortify->Analyze Project \\ or \\ *Open an already saved analysis by going to HP Fortify -> Load Saved Audit Project or HP Fortify -> Open Audit Project \\ This brings up the Fortify Audit perspective \\ \\ {{/Image/ecusn1.jpg}} \\
As you can see TEAM Mentor guidance is automatically displayed whenever a Fortify finding is selected in the SCA Analysis Results view.
